title: . . . And in the Very Disk of the Sun Shines the Face of Jesus Christ (. . . Et dans le disque même du soleil rayonne la face de Jésus-Christ) from The Temptation of Saint Anthony (La Tentation de Saint-Antoine)
medium: Lithograph on chine appliqué from a portfolio of 11 lithographs (including cover, ten on chine appliqué)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 11 x 9" (27.9 x 22.8 cm); sheet: 17 5/8 x 12 5/16" (44.8 x 31.3 cm)
credits: Gift of Abby Aldrich Rockefeller (by exchange)
